metadata.title: CVE-2016-1564 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities inwp-includes/class-wp-theme.php in WordPress before 4.4.1 allow remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a (1) stylesheet nameor (2) template name to wp-admin/customize.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1564` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.4.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.4.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.4.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.4.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.4.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.1+dfsg-1').
